title: Regrets (CRE119)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our nineteenth episode, storytellers Leo Allen, Kevin Allison, Zach Broussard and Alison Leiby share stories about things they wish they could take back. Like they always say, "No Regr-" oh, wait. Never mind.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Zach Broussard, Leo Allen, Alison Leiby, ARMS, The Bran Flakes, Little Death, Lee Rosevere, Shake That Little Foot, Uncle Woody Sullende, No Regrets For Our Youth, Automating, Salakapakka Sound System, Jordan Cooper, King Baldwin, Marshall York, Nest, kevin Allison, Dan Rosen, Steven Bernstein)
